arguments.name: X
arguments.description: The value between A and B at which to evaluate the function

arguments.name: Cumulative
arguments.description: A logical value that determines the form of the function. If cumulative is TRUE, BETA.DIST returns the cumulative distribution function; if FALSE, it returns the probability density function.

arguments.name: A
arguments.description: A lower bound to the interval of x.

arguments.name: B
arguments.description: An upper bound to the interval of x.
